head: Academics
text: The School of Criminology organizes a three-year Master in Criminology: Preparatory Master, Master 1 and Master II (in internal security, economic and environmental criminology, peace and conflict management, child protection, forensic science) , etc..
card1sub: The School also provides certification training in...
card2sub: The School also provides Masters training in...
card3sub: The School also provides PhD training in...
